articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Child dies of horrifying measles complication in Los Angeles - Ars Technica
articles.description: SSPE is a rare but always fatal disease that destroys a child’s brain.

articles.author: Jennifer Ouellette
articles.title: New black hole merger bolsters Hawking area theorem - Ars Technica
articles.description: Physicists spliced merger’s gravitational signal into isolated frequencies to determine surface areas.

articles.author: Amanda Silberling
articles.title: FTC launches inquiry into AI chatbot companions from Meta, OpenAI, and others - TechCrunch
articles.description: The federal consumer regulator seeks to learn about how AI companies evaluate the safety of their chatbots.
articles.content: The Federal Trade Commission announced on Thursday that it is launching an inquiry into seven tech companies that make AI chatbot companion products for minors: Alphabet, CharacterAI, Instagram, Meta… [+2792 chars]
